Articles.Content:
EVERY THING IS ON HOLD.

college is a what more important now than this. i had great plans but no time.

This fictional propulsion system will be the base propulsion for all my mods in the future,im planing to go all star ship and shieet.

Electro Magnetic Shock Propulsion System.

The theory (fictional):

EMSP system uses hydrogen,the shocker and two electric magnetic discs that spin on their opposite direction

This causes friction heat and a magnetic field that compresses the hydrogen inside the field.

Due to the compression and the heat,the hydrogen becomes unstable in its molecular level because its rapidity changes from as to liquid and back.

This will result in uncontrollable substance that is highly explosive.

The shocker will than "shock" this substance with a high voltage jolt to make the substance explode.

This causes one problem for the propulsion as the amount of force isn't constant.

The solution to this was to rapidly increase the process until it wasn't noticeable anymore causing a constant force.

This brought the development to a new problem,as the spinning magnets generate electricity,the faster the magnets would spin the more it would produce,making all electronics blow their fuses or explode.

The chance of this happening has been reduced to a 0.5& chance but it might still occur.

The generated electricity now powers the shocker,the only need for the battery's now is to power the starting motion and keep a constant motion for the magnetic disks.

Uploaded with ImageShack.us

Download

Spaceport

Bugs to be fixed:

Scoop-Remove Node indicator box.

Scoop-Proper align node rotation

Engine-Fix texture

Edit: it uses magnetic discs not dicks. Stupid text error xp

=========================================================================

Kerbal Star Ship(s) Parts pack

This is something i had in the concept pipelines for a while now and i just have started making the parts.

With this pack,im hoping to please as many kerbalnouts as possible that are exited to explore deep space in their star ships.

I will be releasing updates on per ship concept base.

Meaning that i'll create the ships i have drawn as concept and make those parts compatible with each other(on class base/size).

Frigets

This ship(&parts)is in testing*phase

Possible modifications are: increased*weight/stability.

It does not include asas nor RCs,it uses the stock parts for that for now.

Feel free to help

Ship: Stratos 4

Type: Armed

Class: Frigate

Mission: Defend kerbin from incoming*threats.

Download

Done texturing the front,took a while but im liking it,was considering to add a metal texture under the main color's,but idk.

bump maps will be added in unity.

@devogen

i would appreciate that
Cool consept for an Propulsion System That looks huge, what sclade does it get ingame ? I think mr cat is sitting behind the steering wheel nice screens, i also lig big crusiers and such hehe cheers

pheeeuwwwhfff finaly done texturing,only thing to do now is ccenter each part,ad a dummy node(for node cords) export mesh files,copy the files over to my laptop to put it in unity and than i can finally test this baby.
Looking forward to trying this out.
Huh... You know what that reminds me of? Sark's carrier from the original TRON.

Ugh.the parts werent big enoug for me.so i resized 1 and tryd it in ksp,all fien and stuf. Resized every thing,now ksp wont load the parts anymore.. Damit. Will fix it tomorrow i hope. It hangs at startup screen and says loading all the time
You can hit Alt-F2 on the loading screen to open a debug log, that should help you find the problem.

You can hit Alt-F2 on the loading screen to open a debug log, that should help you find the problem.

ok,found the problem.

node_attach = 1.5, 0.0, 9.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 2.0 <- that 2.0 was the problem.

i followed the wiki on cfg and it said that big nodes are size 2. so i putted 2.0 instead of 2.

it needs some testing though.

and throttling up to 100% makes it flip crazy. but apart form that,its all fine.

if any one finds the right mass/weight ect ect.feel free to PM me,ill update the parts right away.
